name: Gateway Models
description: Data structures used for Gateway payloads and events (Identify, Hello, Ready, VoiceState, reaction events, member chunks, etc.).
example:
// Parse a gateway hello payload when received
let hello: GatewayHello = try decoder.decode(GatewayHello.self, from: data)
notes: These types are Codable and map closely to Discord's Gateway JSON. Use `GatewayPayload<T>` for typed event envelopes. Some payloads include optional fields depending on event context.
